name: Photosynthesis (Keenan Sice, Kurojei, belle.ah, Xaldae, Meeeems)
name_original: Photosynthesis (Keenan Sice, Kurojei, belle.ah, Xaldae, Meeeems)
description:
Based on the theme-'Don't kill Anything', Photosynthesis is an exciting game where the player must meet the needs of different plants to keep them alive.

Each plant will state a specific area where they want to go. As the player, you must follow the marked wheelbarrow to take the plant where it needs to be. Failure to do so could upset the plant!

Controls:

WASD or Left Stick to move around.

Spacebar or A/X to pickup/place plants.
